title: Force per unit length between two wires

content.prompt: Two long, straight wires are fixed parallel to one another a distance d0 apart. The wires carry equal constant currents I0 in the same direction. The attractive magnetic force per unit length between them is f = F/L . What is the force per unit length between the wires if their separation is 2d0 and each carries current 2I0 ?

topic.text: 12.3: Magnetic Fields of Current-Carrying Wires and the Biot-Savart Law

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
